channel.title: writeup on Quentin
channel.description: Recent content in writeup on Quentin

item.title: SEETF 2022 Smart Contract DuperSuperSafe
item.description: DuperSuperSafe Challenge Description This was a smart-contract challenge that was part of the recent SEETF 2022 hosted by the Social Engineering Experts. I played this together under 3_Blind_Mice, a random team made together with @chuayupeng and ethon for pure fun and memes. Like all the other smart-contract challenges in this CTF, a vulnerable contract was deployed onto SEETF’s very own private blockchain network. Solving this challenge required knowing a concept in blockchain –> that private variables in a contract are technically public and still readable, and also understanding the difference between tx.

item.title: SEETF 2022 Smart Contract Challenge - RollsRoyce
item.description: RollsRoyce Challenge Description This was a smart-contract challenge that was part of the recent SEETF 2022 hosted by the Social Engineering Experts. I played this together under 3_Blind_Mice, a random team made together with @chuayupeng and ethon for pure fun and memes. Like all the other smart-contract challenges in this CTF, a vulnerable contract was deployed onto SEETF’s very own private blockchain network. Solving this challenge required exploiting 2 vulnerabilities, a pseudorandomness vulnerability that leveraged on block.
